data.text:
Apartment was incredibly dirty, dusty, kitchen sticky, furnitures should be replaced long time ago. Kitchen not really equipped. Housekeeping staff didn't replaced all towels, didn't give toilet paper. 
All noises from the road, no difference with shut balcony door.
After staying there I read a couple of reviews and I realised that only reason why this hotel has got such a good reviews is because staff was requesting that and mentioning their name too..pathetic.
Apart from bad condition of apartment (which of course shouldn't happend in this type of hotel), the worst was how we were treated. 
I was astounded, never seen that before. I was staying with my parents, so 3 people. We got two towels, I had to request 3 times about getting extra one. I was told ' someone will bring it' every time, but never happend till I walked down to reception and asked in person. The same happend next day. Also at reception had to request about toilet paper which was missing. I've never got any glasses (there was just one in the kitchen), and another cup (2 in the kitchen) through our 3 nights staying. We used Costa cups for our morning coffee...Talking to housekeeping staff was like talking to the air.
data.title: Hotel which doesn't care about guests

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for choosing Mercure Dubai and for sharing your feedback with us.

I would like to start by apologizing to you for not meeting your expectations with reference to the challenges you have faced during your stay with us. 
We strive to make each stay as pleasant and memorable as possible, and I sincerely regret we fell short of our goal. 
Thank you for bringing these experiences to our attention and please be assured that we value all our guests' feedback to be of utmost importance and will ensure that necessary corrective measures are taken accordingly to avoid any similar situations in the future.

I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your disappointment with your first stay with us was an exception. 
I would greatly appreciate you allow me the opportunity to reach out to you to further discuss it.
Kindly reach out to us on our email and please share with us more details (room number; dates of the stay) in order to discuss further these matters and to address to you directly in a satisfactory manner. 

Again, we are genuinely sorry for your experience and thank you for sharing your comments.

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text:
+ breakfast: various and generous
+ localisation: 2 min by foot from metro
+ swimming pool
+ very nice gym
- room quality: old room quickly renovated
- room not soundproof: very noisy because of very noisy surroundings
- room cleaning could be better
data.title: Average hotel but very well located

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We greatly appreciate the time you spent reviewing your recent experience in our hotel and for highlighting the excellent facilities and services as well as the convenient location. 

However, I would like to sincerely apologize to you for not meeting your expectations with reference to the challenges you have faced during your stay with us. 
We take all our valued guests’ feedback seriously and as part of our commitment to provide quality service we will take the necessary steps to improve and ensure we meet the service standards for all our valuable guests like yourself. 

Once again, thank you for your comment and I hope this experience will not deter you from coming back to our property.

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text: One of the best hotel in Dubai. Staff are very friendly. Break fast , swimming pool , restaurants are great. Rooms are very clean and tidy. Very close to metro station. I must thank Prakash, Upakshala and Mr Atik to take care our family throw the week
data.title: Best ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,   

Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent visit. 

It is great to know that you love your experience and were impressed with the service rendered by the team. 

Your kind feedback will surely be conveyed to the team. 

Sincerely,  
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text:
I had visited Dubai for business and leisure purpose. I chose to stay at Mercure Suites and this is one of the best experiences I will never forget except for the experience with front office lady

The room was facing Sheikh Zayed Road, skyline, sea, Burj al arab, Al Ain and partly Pam jumeirah. Really amazing view!

First, let me praise the wonderful aspects of this hotel. The rooms, amenities, food, and location are all superb. They have a large size swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna and steam bath. The hotel has a unique charm and elegance that makes it stand out from the rest. But what really impressed me the most was the hospitality and service of the staff members. They were all friendly, helpful, and professional, and they went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable. I made a point of asking for their names, so I can acknowledge them here and express my gratitude. They are:

- Christine, from Day and Light, who was always cheerful and attentive, and made me feel welcome every morning. She had a great hospitality. 

- Azhar and Amman, from the reception, who were courteous and efficient, and handled my requests and inquiries with ease. They were very flexible and accommodating, and they made sure that I got the room and the extra bed that I wanted as it was already confirmed by Omar a month before my checkin date.

- Masur and Parvathi, from the housekeeping, who kept my room spotless and cozy, and provided me with everything I needed. They were very respectful and discreet, and they always greeted me with a smile. They came immediately for assisting me when I called the housekeeping desk.

- Muhammed, Hosseini, and Abdullah, from Codelight, who had amazing hospitality and they made me feel as if I know them from a long time.

- Mahesh, from the swimming pool, who was friendly and helpful. He was very attentive and caring, and he offered me towels. He got ready the steam bath and sauna rooms when I needed them.

- Omar, from the reservations, who was responsive and flexible, and arranged my booking and confirmation smoothly. He was very understanding and generous, and he offered me a free extra bed for the entire stay as a compensation.

The only negative and the worst experience  I had - 

The front office lady (supervisor) was rude by arguing about the extra bed though it was clearly mentioned in the terms and conditions of the itinerary. I had told I have an important meeting and even showed the email where it says the extra bed is included but still she kept arguing and I had to postpone my meeting
data.title: Best hotel with an amazing view!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

It was a great pleasure to have you staying with us and would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.

We’re so glad that you indeed enjoyed your overall experience with us, and we are very happy to know that you were able to experience the hospitality and exceptional service of our hosts, appreciated our convenient location as we love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many excellent places in Dubai.

I would like to apologize in regard to your comment we will investigate it about it.

We look forward to hosting you again for another memorable stay.

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik
